org.unc.lac.baboon.subscription

Class HappeningControllerSubscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.unc.lac.baboon.subscription.AbstractActionControllerSubscription
      • org.unc.lac.baboon.subscription.HappeningControllerSubscription

  • public class HappeningControllerSubscription
extends AbstractActionControllerSubscription
    A HappeningControllerSubscription is one HappeningActionController object subscribed to a topic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ariel Ivan Rabinovich, Juan Jose Arce Giacobbe
    See Also:
    AbstractActionControllerSubscription

    • Constructor Detail

      • HappeningControllerSubscription

        public HappeningControllerSubscription(Topic topic,
                                       HappeningActionController happeningController)
                                throws NotSubscribableException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        topic - The topic to which the HappeningActionController object will be subscribed
        happeningController - The HappeningActionController object that will be subscribed to topic
        Throws:
        NotSubscribableException -
        • When the topic is null
        • If there are guard callbacks on the topic and Topic.setGuardCallback and Topic.permission sizes are different.
        • If the ActionController object does not have a GuardProvider annotated method to handle a guard declared in the topic
        • If there's more than one permission

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public HappeningActionController getAction()
        This method returns the HappeningActionController of this subscription
        Returns:
        the HappeningActionController of this subscription

      • addAction

        protected boolean addAction(ActionController actionController)
                     throws NotSubscribableException
        This method appends the given actionController to the end of AbstractActionControllerSubscription.actionsList
        Overrides:
        addAction in class AbstractActionControllerSubscription
        Parameters:
        actionController - ActionController object to be appended to AbstractActionControllerSubscription.actionsList. The permission and guard callback corresponding to this ActionController are determined by the order (or index).
        Returns:
        true if AbstractActionControllerSubscription.actionsList changed as a result of the call
        Throws:
        NotSubscribableException -
        • If the ActionController object does not have a GuardProvider annotated method to handle a guard declared in the topic
        • If the actionController's type is not an instance of HappeningActionController
        See Also:
        Topic
